import React from "react"; import "./AdminPageAddProduct.css"; import Button from "../ReusableComponents/Button/Button"; import { useAddProductVisibility } from "../../HelperFunctions/AddProductVisibilityContext"; import axios from "axios"; import { useState } from "react"; const AdminPageAddProduct = () => { const { isAddProductVisible, toggleAddProductVisible } = useAddProductVisibility(); const closeAddProductForm = () => { toggleAddProductVisible(false); }; const [inputFields, setInputFields] = useState({ title: "", category: "", price: "", discount: "", description: "", color: "", quantity: "", width: "", height: "", depth: "", featureTitle1: "", featureDescription1: "", featureTitle2: "", featureDescription2: "", featureTitle3: "", featureDescription3: "", keywords: "", imageUrl: "", }); const handleInputChange = (event) => { const { name, value } = event.target; setInputFields((previousFields) => ({ ...previousFields, [name]: value, })); }; const addProductToDatabase = async () => { try { const submitData = await axios.post( "http://localhost:3009/create", inputFields ); } catch (err) { console.log(err); } }; return ( <> {" "} {isAddProductVisible && (

Please fill out the form below to add a new product

)} ); }; export default AdminPageAddProduct; //TODO: finish the add product component as popup //TODO: style select field
